trans-unit.source: Provides methods for creating graphics buffers that can be used for double buffering.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder metoder for oppretting av grafikk buffere som kan brukes for dobbel bufring.

trans-unit.source: The BufferedGraphicsContext class allows you to implement custom double buffering for your graphics.
trans-unit.target: Klassen BufferedGraphicsContext lar deg til å implementere egendefinerte doble hurtigbufring for grafikk.

trans-unit.source: Graphics that use double buffering can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by redrawing a display surface.
trans-unit.target: Grafikk som bruker doble bufring kan redusere eller fjerne flimmer som forårsakes av oppdatering en visning overflate.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The simplest way to use double buffering is to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> control style flag on a control using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den enkleste måten å bruke doble bufring er å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>Kontrollere stil flagg på en kontroll ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> control styles flag for a control redirects all painting for the control through a default graphics buffer, without requiring any additional code.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>kontrollen stiler flagg for en kontroll omadresserer alle malingen for kontrollen via en standard grafikk buffer uten at det kreves ekstra kode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: This flag is set to `true` by default.
trans-unit.target: Dette flagget er satt til `true` som standard.

trans-unit.source: The BufferedGraphicsContext class provides methods for creating and configuring a graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: Klassen BufferedGraphicsContext inneholder metoder for å opprette og konfigurere en grafikk-buffer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method creates a <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>, which is a wrapper for a graphics buffer that also provides methods you can use to write to the buffer and render its contents to an output device.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>metoden oppretter en <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>, som er en tekstbryting for en grafikk buffer som gir deg også metoder for å skrive til bufferen og gjengi innholdet til en output-enhet.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the BufferedGraphicsContext for the current application domain from the static <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan hente BufferedGraphicsContext for gjeldende programdomenet fra statiske <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For graphically intensive applications such as animation, you can create a dedicated BufferedGraphicsContext using the constructor, but for most applications the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property will be sufficient.
trans-unit.target: For grafisk applikasjoner som animasjonen, kan du opprette en dedikert BufferedGraphicsContext ved hjelp av konstruktøren, men for de fleste programmer i <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>blir tilstrekkelig.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on drawing buffered graphics and custom buffering implementations, see [Double Buffered Graphics](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Manually Manage Buffered Graphics](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om tegning bufret grafikk og egendefinerte bufring implementeringer, se [doble bufret grafikk](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [slik: manuelt administrere bufret grafikk](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: For graphically intensive applications such as animation, you can sometimes improve performance by using a dedicated <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> instead of the default instance provided by the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager>.
trans-unit.target: For grafisk applikasjoner som animasjonen, kan du noen ganger forbedre ytelsen ved å bruke en dedikert <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>i stedet for standardforekomsten fra <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager>.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create and manage graphics buffers individually.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du kan opprette og administrere grafikk buffere enkeltvis.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should always call <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Dispose%2A> when you finish using a dedicated <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Bør du alltid kalle <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Dispose%2A>Når du er ferdig med å bruke en dedikert <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about dedicated graphics buffers, see [How to: Manually Manage Buffered Graphics](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om dedikert grafikk buffere [slik: manuelt administrere bufret grafikk](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a graphics buffer of the specified size using the pixel format of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en grafikk buffer med den angitte størrelsen ved hjelp av pikselformat for det angitte <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you call the Allocate method with a rectangle whose size exceeds the value of the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.MaximumBuffer%2A> property, a temporary <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> is created to allocate the buffer and provide a temporary context for the buffer.
trans-unit.target: Når du kaller metoden tildeles med et rektangel størrelse overskrider verdien av det <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.MaximumBuffer%2A>egenskapen, en midlertidig <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>er opprettet for å tildele buffer og angi en midlertidig kontekst for bufferen.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.MaximumBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> is distinct from the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the application domain and it is disposed automatically when the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> returned by the Allocate method is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>er forskjellig fra det <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>for applikasjonen domene, og den er fjernet automatisk når den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>returnert av tildeles metoden er fjernet.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to match the pixel format for the new buffer to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> som samsvarer med pikselformat for den nye-bufferen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> indicating the size of the buffer to create.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som angir størrelsen på bufferen til å opprette.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics"></xref> that can be used to draw to a buffer of the specified dimensions.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics"> </xref> som kan brukes til å tegne en buffer med de angitte dimensjonene.

trans-unit.source: Creates a graphics buffer of the specified size using the pixel format of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en grafikk buffer med den angitte størrelsen ved hjelp av pikselformat for det angitte <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method with a rectangle whose size exceeds the value of the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.MaximumBuffer%2A> property, a temporary <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> is created to allocate the buffer and provide a temporary context for the buffer.
trans-unit.target: Når du kaller den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>metode med et rektangel størrelse overskrider verdien for den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.MaximumBuffer%2A>egenskapen, en midlertidig <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>er opprettet for å tildele buffer og angi en midlertidig kontekst for bufferen.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.MaximumBuffer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> is distinct from the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the application domain and it is disposed automatically when the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> returned by the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>er forskjellig fra det <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>for applikasjonen domene, og den er fjernet automatisk når den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>returnert av den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>metoden er fjernet.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> to a device context to match the pixel format of the new buffer to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IntPtr>til en enhet konteksten som samsvarer med pikselformat for den nye-bufferen.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> indicating the size of the buffer to create.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som angir størrelsen på bufferen til å opprette.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics"></xref> that can be used to draw to a buffer of the specified dimensions.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics"> </xref> som kan brukes til å tegne en buffer med de angitte dimensjonene.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: Kall avhending når du er ferdig med <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Fjerningsmetoden forlater den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter å avhending, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>ble bruker.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall fjerne før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: Ellers vil ressurser den bruker ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamlingen kaller <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metoden for <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Gjør det mulig for et objekt å prøve å frigjøre ressurser og utføre andre operasjoner for opprydding før den er gode av datasanering.

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the current graphics buffer, if a buffer has been allocated and has not yet been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Disposes på den gjeldende grafikk bufferen, hvis en buffer har blitt tildelt og ennå ikke blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: If the graphics buffer is in use, it will be marked for disposal as soon as it is free; otherwise, it will be disposed immediately.
trans-unit.target: Hvis grafikk bufferen er i bruk, blir den merket for Salg så snart det er gratis; Hvis ikke, den vil bli fjernet umiddelbart.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size of the buffer to use.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den maksimale størrelsen på bufferen som skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to get or set the maximum dimensions for a buffer that should be retained in memory.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan du hente eller angi maksimalt antall dimensjonene for en buffer som skal beholdes i minnet.

trans-unit.source: You can allocate a buffer of any size, however any buffer with dimensions greater than the MaximumBuffer size will be used temporarily and then discarded when the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object is released.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tildele en buffer med en størrelse, men en buffer med dimensjoner som er større enn MaximumBuffer vil bli brukt midlertidig og forkastet når den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>objekt er utgitt.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> indicating the maximum size of the buffer dimensions.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som angir den maksimale størrelsen på bufferen-dimensjoner.

trans-unit.source: The height or width of the size is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: Høyden eller bredden på størrelsen er mindre enn eller lik null.
